block.p: American League BOSTON RED SOX--Recalled RHP Dan Smith from Pawtucket of the International League. Optioned RHP Rod Beck and INF Andy Sheets to Pawtucket. Transferred 3B John Valentin from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Placed OF Manny Ramirez on the 15-day disabled, retroactive to May 30. Purchased the contract of RHP Jamie Brewington from Buffalo of the International League. Transferred LHP Ricardo Rincon from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list. Promoted Wendy Hoppel Hughes to director of baseball administration. DETROIT TIGERS--Activated OF Damion Easley from 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Brandon Villafuerte to Toledo of International League. KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Agreed to terms with 3B Joe Randa on a one-year contract extension. SEATTLE MARINERS--Activated LHP Jamie Moyer from 15-day disabled list. Optioned 3B Carlos Guillen to Tacoma of Pacific Coast League.

National League CHICAGO CUBS--Recalled OF Gary Matthews Jr. from Iowa of the Pacific Coast League. Optioned INF Julio Zuleta to Iowa. FLORIDA MARLINS--Recalled RHP Joe Strong from Calgary of the Pacific Coast League. METS--Acquired OF-INF Lenny Harris from the Arizona Diamondbacks for LHP Bill Pulsipher. Designated OF Jon Nunnally for assignment. Recalled OF Ryan McGuire and C Vance Wilson from Norfolk of the International League. Optioned RHP Jim Mann to Norfolk. PHILDELPHIA PHILLIES--Placed LHP Scott Aldred on the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of LHP Mark Holzemer from Scranton-Wilkes-Barre of the International League. Optioned RHP Paul Byrd to Scranton-Wilkes-Barre. Recalled RHP Cliff Politte from Scranton-Wilkes-Barre. Named Gene Dias director of community relations and Leigh Tobin manager, media relations and publications, effective July 1, and Regina Castellani manager, Phillies Charities, Inc.
National Basketball Association NETS--Named Rod Thorn president. Women's National Basketball Association LIBERTY--Waived C Venus Lacy. Activated F Desiree Francis.

National Football League DALLAS COWBOYS--Released CB Deion Sanders. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Released LB Bryce Paup. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Released G Kevin Donnalley. Signed FB Deon Dyer to a three-year contract. MINNESOTA VIKINGS--Released QB Randall Cunningham. Signed P Eddie Howard and WR Jeremy Earp. GIANTS--Announced the retirement of FB Charles Way. PHILADELPHIA EAGLES--Signed RB Thomas Hamner to a three-year contract. Released TE Eric Stocz. ST. LOUIS RAMS--Re-signed CB Taje Allen, WR Tony Horne, DT Nate Hobgood-Chittick and RB Justin Watson to one-year contracts. SAN DIEGO CHARGERS--Re-signed RB-KR Kenny Bynum to a one-year contract.

ANAHEIM MIGHTY DUCKS--Agreed to terms with D Antti-Jussi Niemi on a two-year contract. CAROLINA HURRICANES--Agreed to terms with F Jeff Heerema on a multiyear contract. DALLAS STARS--Signed D John Erskine to a three-year contract. DETROIT RED WINGS--Signed LW Ryan Barnes to a three-year contract. Announced a two-year agreement with Toledo of the East Coast Hockey League. FLORIDA PANTHERS--Signed D Kyle Rossiter and LW Ryan Jardine to multiyear contracts. Traded 2000 seventh-round pick to Tampa Bay for LW Eric Beaudoin. Agreed to terms with C Len Barrie. MINNESOTA WILD--Signed F Richard Park. TORONTO MAPLE LEAFS--Announced they will not renew the contracts of Peter Johnson and Jack Gardiner, amateur scouts. WASHINGTON CAPITALS--Acquired D Stephen Peat from the Anaheim Mighty Ducks for a 2000 fourth-round draft pick.
